document.heading: Record Sealing for Decriminalized and Legalized Offenses Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-186, the “Record Sealing for Decriminalized and Legalized Offenses Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-467. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 7, 2014, and Oct. 28, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 12, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-470 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-186 became effective on Mar. 10, 2015.
